RequestInformation.Name: PackageName
RequestInformation.Label: Package Name
RequestInformation.Description: The name of the package that was used to make the request.

RequestInformation.Name: SearchTerm
RequestInformation.Label: Search Term
RequestInformation.Description: The value used to do the look up.

RequestInformation.Name: SearchType
RequestInformation.Label: Search Type
RequestInformation.Description: Which data item that is being looked up.

RequestInformation.Name: RequestIp
RequestInformation.Label: Request IP Address
RequestInformation.Description: The IP address where the request was made from.

ResponseInformation.Name: StatusMessage
ResponseInformation.Label: Status Code Text
ResponseInformation.Description: The status of the response as text

ResponseInformation.Name: IsSuccessStatusCode
ResponseInformation.Label: Is Status Code Successful
ResponseInformation.Description: This returns whether the status of the response indicates that the request was successful.

ResponseInformation.Name: QueryTimeMs
ResponseInformation.Label: Query Time
ResponseInformation.Description: This is the amount of time the query took to execute in milliseconds

ResponseInformation.Name: ResponseId
ResponseInformation.Label: Response Identifier
ResponseInformation.Description: This is the unique identifier of the report.

BillingInformation.Name: BillingTransactionId
BillingInformation.Label: Billing Transaction Id
BillingInformation.Description: This is the unique reference to the billing transaction for this lookup.

BillingInformation.Name: AccountType
BillingInformation.Label: Account Type
BillingInformation.Description: This is the current type of account that defines how the account is billed.

BillingInformation.Name: AccountBalance
BillingInformation.Label: Account Balance
BillingInformation.Description: The current balance of the account if this is a pay as a go account.

BillingInformation.Name: TransactionCost
BillingInformation.Label: Transaction Cost
BillingInformation.Description: The total cost of the transaction if the transaction required billing.

VehicleCodes.Name: UkvdId
VehicleCodes.Label: UKVD Id
VehicleCodes.Description: UK Vehicle Data Vehicle record Id.

ObjectProperties.Name: VinLast5
ObjectProperties.Label: VIN Last 5
ObjectProperties.Description: The last 5 digits of the VIN.

ObjectProperties.Name: DateFirstRegisteredInUk
ObjectProperties.Label: Date First Registered in UK
ObjectProperties.Description: Date the vehicle was first registered in the UK.

ObjectProperties.Name: DateFirstRegistered
ObjectProperties.Label: Date First Registered
ObjectProperties.Description: Date the vehicle was first registered.

MotHistoryDetails.Name: LatestTestDate
MotHistoryDetails.Label: Latest Test Date
MotHistoryDetails.Description: The date of the latest MOT test.

MotHistoryDetails.Name: MotDueDate
MotHistoryDetails.Label: MOT Due Date
MotHistoryDetails.Description: Due date for the next MOT test.

VehicleTaxDetails.Name: TaxStatus
VehicleTaxDetails.Label: Tax Status
VehicleTaxDetails.Description: The vehicle's current road tax status.

VehicleTaxDetails.Name: TaxDueDate
VehicleTaxDetails.Label: Tax Due Date
VehicleTaxDetails.Description: Date the vehicle's road tax is next due.
